messages.content:
You are a Customer Support Manager. Analyze the following support ticket description.

Ticket Description: [Map the "Description" field from Module 1 here]

Classify the urgency as either "URGENT" (if it mentions broken payments, security, or data loss) or "ROUTINE" (if it is a general question).

Draft a polite, 1-sentence acknowledgement email to the user.

Output format: Urgency: [URGENT/ROUTINE] Draft: [Your draft here]
